document.full_text: american andy roddick's miserable season on clay continued monday when he was knocked out in the rome masters first round 6-3 6-3 by frenchman gilles simon.
document.title: roddick makes early exit in rome
lines_and_colors: american andy roddick's miserable season on clay continued monday when he was knocked out in the rome masters first round 6-3 6-3 by frenchman gilles simon.
